statements: DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE online_store_quantity > 50 AND physical_store_quantity < 20;
DELETE FROM online_store_inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND online_quantity <= 5;
DELETE FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Chair' AND physical_quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM stock_history WHERE store_id = 1 AND product_id = 100;
DELETE FROM OnlineStoresInventory WHERE store_id = 1 AND product_id = 100;
DELETE FROM PhysicalStoresInventory WHERE product_id = 200 AND store_id = 2;
